## Setup

Clear the workspace
```{r}
rm(list = ls())
```

Load packages
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

NB: need to transfer scripts to `/code/`:

* run_gsva2.pbs
* gsva2.sh
* gsva2.r

Read in data
```{r}
gs_matrix <- readRDS("output/dlbcl_total_immune_gset_v2_results.rds")
gs_matrix[, 1:5]
```
